changelogs.description: Fixes to the Word Press Lab
changelogs.author: linkedin|9k1sAi8dfa

components.title: Who Can Do This Course
components.description: Who can do this course? Well anyone! We make it easy as possible for people to learn cloud computing!

components.title: Setting Up On A Mac
components.description: How to setup your mac to do the rest of this course.

components.title: Setting Up On A Windows PC
components.description: How to setup your Windows PC to do the rest of this course.

components.title: The Exam Blue Print
components.description: An overview of the AWS certified Cloud Practitioner exam blueprint

components.title: What Is Cloud Computing?
components.description: We've all heard the term, but do you know what Cloud Computing actually is, what benefits it brings, what the different types of cloud computing are and what are the different deployment models? In this lecture we explore the cloud.

components.title: Around The World With AWS
components.description: In this lecture we are going to learn the differences between regions, availability zones and edge locations.

components.title: Let's Log In To AWS
components.description: In this lecture we will create our new AWS account and log in to the console for the first time.

components.title: Let’s Start To Cloud!  Identity Access Management (IAM)
components.description: This is our first hands on lab. In this lab we will set up new users, groups, assign security policies to groups, enable multifactor authentication on our accounts and start getting our hands dirty with AWS.

components.title: S3 101
components.description: In this theoretical lecture we'll learn all about the fundamentals of S3.

components.title: Let's Create An S3 Bucket!
components.description: In this video we will create an S3 bucket in which to store our files. We'll also test transfer acceleration and briefly look at cross region replication.

components.title: Let's Create A Website On S3
components.description: In this lecture we'll create a website on S3.

components.title: Let's Explore CloudFront
components.description: In this lecture we'll create a cloudfront distribution.

components.title: EC2 101
components.description: Learn all about EC2 in this theoretical lecture. EC2 is the bedrock of AWS and perhaps its most famous service!

components.title: Let's Use EC2
components.description: Let's get our hands dirty and provision our very first EC2 instance.

components.title: Using The Command Line
components.description: In this lecture we will use the EC2 command line.

components.title: Using Roles
components.description: In this lecture we'll look at how we can use roles instead of access key id's and secret access keys.

components.title: Let's Build A Web Server
components.description: In this lecture we'll build a simple web server using Apache.

notes.title: Lab files for Website (Same as S3 lab files)

components.title: Let's Use A Load Balancer
components.description: In this lecture we will learn how to use load balancers and how to add our instances behind them.

components.title: Databases 101
components.description: Learn the fundamentals around relational, non-relational and business intelligence/data warehouse databases.

components.title: Let's provision an RDS instance
components.description: In this lecture we'll dive in to AWS and provision an RDS instance.

components.title: Autoscaling
components.description: Let's make our application redundant using autoscaling.

components.title: Let's Register A Domain Name
components.description: In this lecture we'll register a domain name using Route53.

components.title: Elastic Beanstalk
components.description: In this lecture we'll look at how we can automate our infrastructure provisioning using Elastic Beanstalk.

components.title: CloudFormation
components.description: In this lecture we'll look at how we can turn our infrastructure in to code using AWS CloudFormation.

components.title: Architecting For The Cloud Best Practices
components.description: In this lecture we'll review the architecting for the cloud best practices white paper.

components.title: Cloud Concepts & Technology Summary
components.description: In this lecture we'll review what we've learnt in Section 2 of Cloud Concepts & Technology.

components.title: Chapter 2 Quiz
components.description: Chapter 2 Quiz

components.title: AWS Pricing 101
components.description: In this lecture you will learn the basics of AWS pricing for the fundamental services.

components.title: Different Support Levels
components.description: In this lecture we'll look at the different support levels available to AWS customers.

components.title: Resource Groups & Tagging
components.description: In this lecture we'll look at using resource groups and tagging.

components.title: Consolidated Billing
components.description: In this lecture we'll look at how using consolidated billing can save us money.

components.title: AWS Organizations
components.description: In this lecture we'll look AWS Organizations.

components.title: Billing & Pricing Summary
components.description: In this lecture we'll look at what we've learnt about billing and pricing in AWS.

components.title: Chapter 3 Quiz
components.description: Chapter 3 Quiz

components.title: AWS Compliance
components.description: In this lecture we'll look at the various AWS compliance attestations.

components.title: Shared Responsibility Model
components.description: In this lecture we'll look at the shared responsibility model.

components.title: AWS WAF & AWS Shield
components.description: In this lecture we'll learn what AWS WAF is and what AWS Shield is.

components.title: AWS Inspector vs AWS Trusted Advisor
components.description: AWS inspector vs AWS Trusted advisor. You need to have a clear understanding of the differences going in to your exam.

components.title: Security Summary
components.description: What we learnt in the security section of the course.

components.title: Chapter 4 Quiz
components.description: Chapter 4 Quiz

components.title: Mega Quiz
components.description: Mega Quiz
